casebody.data:
Anna ADAMSKA, n/k/a Anna Chlewicka, Petitioner,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Sandra L. Pomrenze, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Mariusz Adamski, Real Party in Interest. No. 78450 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED MAY 15, 2019

DENIED.
